#summary This page provides help information about the Facebook Show Wall web part

= What is Facebook Show Wall Web Part =

  * This webpart is used to show the facebook updates of the user on the site.

= Where Facebook Show Wall Web Part is used =
  * It is used on the default home page of the site.


= Adding Web Part=
  * [http://code.google.com/p/sharepoint-facebook-wall/wiki/Installation Installing web part.]
    * This will help to install the solution to the site.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/sharepoint-facebook-wall/wiki/ApplicationRegistrationFacebook Register your application on Facebook]
    * This will help to register the facebook application which will allpw to get the updates from the Facebook
  * [http://code.google.com/p/sharepoint-facebook-wall/wiki/ShowWallConfiguration Configure ths Show Wall webpart]
    * This will help the administrator to configure the facebook Show Wall webpart.

  * *Note:* To know more of Facebook !WebParts click [http://code.google.com/p/sharepoint-facebook-wall here.]
